You know something. I don't know why but I've been hoping for a specific type of NTR where the heroine is in love with some dude, another guy who genuinely likes her starts to meddle, and the heroine reciprocates the feelings completely and not just lustfully. Something like Rumbling Hearts where the emotions are understandable and it isn't so disgustingly evil. Something that takes the NTR format but adds in Vanilla elements of romance that shows the heroine very much does like both guys and simply has to make a decision in what she wants in a relationship and who is better suited to fulfilling those desires and officially cuts the other one out without being so mean. I could very much get behind that and this came close to that but stuck to it's full NTR path. I just want something new instead of the tired old formats. It's getting to the point where I don't even hate NTR because it's just the same shit nor love my vanilla because again it's the same love story with different faces.

She’s gonna get caught for sure. It’s way too obvious. I wish the author showed that, I hate it when ntr teases a conclusion and nothing happens.
